headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Datadog (DDOG) Exploring a GitLab Takeover and Securing Gartner Leadership
summary: In October 2025, Datadog was reported to be working with Morgan Stanley to explore a potential takeover bid for GitLab, with sources indicating a possible offer above US$60 per share. Additionally, Datadog received renewed attention for its leadership in cloud monitoring and was recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Digital Experience Monitoring. Datadog's recent position at the forefront of the observability market, especially as AI-driven demands grow, highlights...

headline: Assessing Datadog’s Valuation After New Cloud Integrations and a 22% Share Price Jump
summary: Curious whether Datadog stock is a smart buy right now? You are not alone, especially with a name that keeps popping up in conversations about innovative tech investments. In the last year alone, Datadog shares have climbed 21.7%. The total return was 109.5% over three years and 59.8% across five years, making investors wonder if high growth or new risks are in play. Recent headlines highlight partnerships and cloud innovations that have drawn fresh attention to Datadog’s platform. This...
